OpenSimMPLS uses third-party components each one of them having its own OSS 
license. License compatibility has been taken into account to allow OpenSimMPLS
be released under its current OSS licence. They are:

- slf4j-api 2.0.0-alpha1 - MIT - https://www.slf4j.org
- slf4j-simple 2.0.0-alpha1 - MIT - https://www.slf4j.org
- mjson 1.4.1 - Apache-2.0 - http://bolerio.github.io/mjson
- junit-jupiter-engine 5.7.0 - EPL-2.0 - https://junit.org/junit5

Thanks folks!
